# VisualShaderNodeComment

**Deprecated:** This class has no function anymore and only exists for compatibility.

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeFrame](VisualShaderNodeFrame.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNodeResizableBase](VisualShaderNodeResizableBase.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Only exists for compatibility. Use [VisualShaderNodeFrame](VisualShaderNodeFrame.md) as a replacement.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This node was replaced by [VisualShaderNodeFrame](VisualShaderNodeFrame.md) and only exists to preserve compatibility. In the [VisualShader](VisualShader.md) editor it behaves exactly like [VisualShaderNodeFrame](VisualShaderNodeFrame.md).
